text: For future JuliaCons could CFP be due even a week or so later? Could catch a lot of end-of-academic-semester projects as possible proposals.

elements.text: For future JuliaCons could CFP be due even a week or so later? Could catch a lot of end-of-academic-semester projects as possible proposals.

text: I thought we always extend the due date on the last day to add a week or two.

elements.text: I thought we always extend the due date on the last day to add a week or two.

text: hard to anticipate these things. I have a few students doing Julia projects for my course this semester, and posted about the CFP. But I suspect most students won’t have much done on their projects so far from the due date :stuck_out_tongue:
